extensionDescription.message: Scroll pages in VIM style, using j and k shortcuts.

pagedownpageup.message: PageDown and PageUp scroll the value indicated above

horizontalscroll.message: Use the shortcut J/K for horizontal scrolling

horizontalscrollshift.message: Use the shortcut Shift+J/Shift+K for horizontal scrolling

horizontalscrollalt.message: Use the shortcut Alt+J/Alt+K for horizontal scrolling

blacklist_descr.message: Comma separated list of domains. Scrollkey will not work on these websites.

notify_tip_horizontal.message: This page cannot be scrolled horizontally. Change the preferences to scroll vertically or try another shortcut.

notify_tip_vertical.message: This page cannot be scrolled vertically. Change the preferences to scroll horizontally or try another shortcut.
